ns2:member.ns1:desc: Only PDSCH load without Beam Forming

Only PDSCH load with Beam Forming Type 1. Beam Forming Type 1 emulates in total four predefined beams. One and the same beam per TTI is used during ailgChangePeriod, after which the beam is changed to another one according to a predefined order.
PDSCH load without Beam Forming, and PDCCH load

PDSCH load with Beam Forming Type 1, and PDCCH load. Beam Forming Type 1 emulates in total four predefined beams. One and the same beam per TTI is used during ailgChangePeriod, after which the beam is changed to another one according to a predefined order.

Only PDSCH load with Beam Forming Type 2. Beam Forming Type 2 emulates in total four predefined beams. Four beams per TTI are used during ailgChangePeriod, after which the PRB positions for each beam are changed according to a predefined order.

PDSCH load with Beam Forming Type 2, and PDCCH load. Beam Forming Type 2 emulates in total four predefined beams. Four beams per TTI are used during ailgChangePeriod, after which the PRB positions for each beam are changed according to a predefined order.
